Make sure the pull request's title is conventional (https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) and includes the Jira. 

Make sure the pull request's description is clear and concise is critical for the reviewer to understand what they're reviewing. 

Make sure your reviewer knows you need their review.

Tips to merge your PR fast: http://in/pr-tips

Apps to help you with your PR: 

- https://github.olorin.com/github-apps/pull-request-notifier - get notified when someone reviews your PR
- https://github.olorin.com/github-apps/semantic-pull-requests - get notified when your PR is not conventional
- https://github.olorin.com/github-apps/api-governance-service - get notified when your PR is not compliant with API standards
